N174 Goodwin's Celebrities and Prizefighters: Atkinson, Cuerrero, Fitzgerald

Looking for any condition, these are the track and field I am aware of. Would also consider Between the Acts/Bravo pedestrians. I may also consider off-grade cards from other sports as well.

Thanks for looking.

Please send a PM and/or email ehpiiiATaolDOTcom.

Best,
Ed
